bibl.title: On the "Artemidorus" Papyrus.
bibl.note: P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). A preliminary report on the work presented in the paper has been anticipated in: L'indice dei libri del mese 2009, No. 4, p. 7. - A. The Story of the Papyrus. - B. The Structure of the Papyrus. Part 1. - C. Two Alternative Explanations: "The Three Lives" vs. "Constantine Simonides". - D. Can It Be A Forgery? - E. Why It Cannot Be Artemidorus Book 2. - F. The Structure of the Papyrus. Part. 2. - G. What Was The Project Behind The Roll?
